mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_SN, COMMENT_USER_ID, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_DATE FROM comment
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment( COMMENT_SN, COMMENT_BOARD_SN, COMMENT_USER_ID, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_DATE ) VALUES( NEXTVAL(commentSn), #{commentBoardSn}, #{commentUserId}, #{commentContent}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET COMMENT_CONTENT = #{commentContent}, COMMENT_UPDDATE_DATE = now() WHERE COMMENT_SN = #{commentSn}
